sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi yi si 自縊死 , [appearance of] death from suicide by hanging. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 以繩物系頸 , 自懸掛致死 , 呼為自縊 , “To take a rope, tie it around the neck, and hang oneself to cause death, this is called ‘ hanging oneself ’”. Zi yi si 自縊死 , [appearance of] death from hanging oneself [2]

Abbreviated Designation zi yi 自縊 , hanging oneself; 卒縊垂死 , suicide by hanging. Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from an attempt at committing suicide by hanging. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 以葱刺耳…亦治自縊死 , “Pierce the ear with a scallion. … This also cures [appearance of] death from hanging oneself ”.
